data.lyric:
[ti:In Your Eyes (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]In Your Eyes (Explicit) - The Weeknd
[00:04.13]Lyrics by：Oscar Holter/Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Ahmad Balshe/Karl Martin Sandberg
[00:08.26]Composed by：Oscar Holter/Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Ahmad Balshe/Karl Martin Sandberg
[00:12.39]Oh yeah
[00:13.16]
[00:14.86]I just pretend that I'm in the dark
[00:24.47]I don't regret 'cause my heart can't take a loss
[00:33.38]I'd rather be so oblivious
[00:38.43]I'd rather be with you
[00:43.89]When it's said when it's done yeah
[00:46.26]I don't ever wanna know
[00:48.73]I can tell what you done yeah
[00:50.94]When I look at you
[00:52.22]In your eyes
[00:55.21]I see there's something burning inside you
[00:59.41]Oh inside you
[01:01.82]In your eyes
[01:04.87]I know it hurts to smile but you try to
[01:08.47]
[01:09.14]Oh you try to
[01:11.50]You always try to hide the pain
[01:13.95]You always know just what to say
[01:16.17]I always look the other way
[01:19.06]I'm blind I'm blind
[01:21.32]In your eyes
[01:24.21]You lie but I don't let it define you
[01:27.67]
[01:28.18]Oh define you
[01:31.65]I tried to find love
[01:35.58]In someone else too many times
[01:40.88]But I hope you know I mean it
[01:44.67]Mean it
[01:45.44]When I tell you you're the one that was on my mind oh
[01:51.12]When it's said when it's done yeah
[01:53.49]I would never let you know
[01:55.13]Let you know
[01:55.84]I'm ashamed of what I've done yeah
[01:58.28]When I look at you
[01:59.42]In your eyes
[02:01.39]Your eyes
[02:02.43]I see there's something burning inside you
[02:06.09]Inside you
[02:06.80]Oh inside you
[02:08.36]Oh inside you
[02:09.05]In your eyes
[02:12.14]I know it hurts to smile but you try to
[02:15.32]But you try to
[02:16.36]Oh you try to
[02:18.11]You try to
[02:18.68]You always try to hide the pain
[02:20.81]Oh oh
[02:21.32]You always know just what to say
[02:23.12]Oh dear
[02:23.43]I always look the other way
[02:26.19]I'm blind I'm blind
[02:28.30]In your eyes
[02:31.32]You lie but I don't let it define you
[02:34.81]Hey
[02:35.38]Oh define you
[02:47.77]In your eyes
[02:50.46]I see there's something burning inside you
[02:54.64]Oh inside you
[02:57.13]You always try to hide the pain
[02:59.47]You always know just what to say
[03:01.79]I always look the other way
[03:04.58]I'm blind I'm blind
[03:06.87]In your eyes
[03:09.93]You lie but I don't let it define you
[03:13.75]Oh define you
data.trans:
[ti:于你的眸中 (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.13]//
[00:08.26]//
[00:12.39]//
[00:14.86]我不过是伪装自己毫不知情
[00:24.47]我不让自己有一丝遗憾 因为我的心无力承受失去
[00:33.38]我宁愿自己是个健忘的人
[00:38.43]我宁愿时刻守在你的身边
[00:43.89]当一切尘埃落定时
[00:46.26]我也并不想知道
[00:48.73]我能看得出来你的所作所为
[00:50.94]就在我注视于你的那一刻
[00:52.22]于你的眸中
[00:55.21]我仿佛看到了你心底炙热的爱火
[00:59.41]你心底
[01:01.82]于你的眸中
[01:04.87]我明白这微笑其中的苦涩 而你总是会笑对所有
[01:08.47]
[01:09.14]噢 你总是会
[01:11.50]你总是会费尽心机掩盖那些苦痛
[01:13.95]而无论何时你也清楚该说些什么
[01:16.17]即便我的目光总是转向他处
[01:19.06]我熟视无睹 熟视无睹
[01:21.32]于你的眸中
[01:24.21]你也会说谎 但这并不影响我对你的判断
[01:27.67]
[01:28.18]对你的判断
[01:31.65]我曾千方百计不顾一切
[01:35.58]企图在他人身上寻得真爱痕迹
[01:40.88]但我希望你能明白我的真心实意
[01:44.67]真心实意
[01:45.44]就在那刻 我对你说 你就是我心底无可取代的唯一
[01:51.12]当一切尘埃落定时
[01:53.49]我绝不会让你知道
[01:55.13]让你知道
[01:55.84]我为曾经自己的所作所为惭愧不已
[01:58.28]就在我注视于你的那一刻
[01:59.42]于你的眸中
[02:01.39]你的双眸
[02:02.43]我仿佛看到了你心底炙热的爱火
[02:06.09]你心底
[02:06.80]你心底
[02:08.36]你心底
[02:09.05]于你的眸中
[02:12.14]我明白这微笑其中的苦涩 而你总是会笑对所有
[02:15.32]而你总是会
[02:16.36]噢 你总是会
[02:18.11]你总是会
[02:18.68]你总是会费尽心机掩盖那些苦痛
[02:20.81]//
[02:21.32]而无论何时你也清楚该说些什么
[02:23.12]亲爱的
[02:23.43]即便我的目光总是转向他处
[02:26.19]我熟视无睹 熟视无睹
[02:28.30]于你的眸中
[02:31.32]你也会说谎 但这并不影响我对你的判断
[02:34.81]//

[02:54.64]你心底
[02:57.13]你总是会费尽心机掩盖那些苦痛
[02:59.47]而无论何时你也清楚该说些什么
